for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    s = list(input())
    count = 0
    lZero = len(s) - 1
    fUnit = 0
    f = 0
    g = 1
    while lZero > fUnit and fUnit < lZero:
        while lZero > fUnit and s[lZero] == str(g):
            lZero -= 1
        while fUnit < lZero and s[fUnit] == str(f):
            fUnit += 1
        if lZero != fUnit:
            count += 1
        (f, g) = (g, f)
    print(count)
